description.ko: 인공적 디자인과 자연적 생명력 사이의 경계를 탐구하는 AURA-7의 시각적 연구입니다. 끊임없이 이어지는 부드러운 곡선과 유동적인 형태 내부에서 박동하는 생생한 에너지를 통해 움직임의 정수를 포착합니다.
description.en: A visual study of AURA-7 that explores the boundary between synthetic design and natural vitality. It captures the essence of movement through continuous, sweeping curves and a living energy that pulses from within its fluid form.

prompt: A cinematic, hyper-realistic rendering of AURA-7, a sculptural entity defined by fluid, ribbon-like curves and iridescent metallic textures. The form mimics the rhythmic movement of deep-sea currents, with soft internal bioluminescence glowing through translucent layers. The atmosphere is ethereal and minimalist, featuring a soft gradient background that emphasizes the seamless, organic flow of the structure. 8k resolution, macro photography style, liquid metal aesthetics, serene and biological vibe.
